name: updatePassword
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for updating the user password:

Request payload must contain the following fields:

user_id: STRING,
old_password: STRING,
new_password: STRING

Request:

PUT - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/mentors/updatePassword

raw 
  {
    "user_id": "1",
    "old_password": "Welcome@124",
    "new_password": "wHm6eGCL7uFOArs="
}

Response:

404 - Not Found 

  {"status":404,"status_type":"error","message":"User pasword doesn't match","count":null,"data":null}
